messages.content: Voters know that only Gordon Brown or David Cameron can wake up as Prime Minister after polling day. At this election there is a clear choice between a government committed to the jobs and the recovery, and the Tories, who are more concerned with tax breaks for the rich.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defend and fight to extend local bus services
Protect workers' rights and the national minimum wage
Tackle anti-social behaviour and campaign for more affordable housing
Campaign against cuts to nurseries, creches and schools
Fight for the rights of older people to be warm and safe in their own homes

housing.content: Tackle anti-social behaviour and campaign for more affordable housing

leaflet.personalStatement: After talking to 1000s of residents, I've set out my five key priorities for our community. With my background as a Councillor, a family lawyer and a mother of four children, I believe I have what it takes to succeed Gavin Strang and serve this community as your MP.
